name: village_elder_start
monologue: Greetings, traveler. I have been expecting you. Do you seek the Sword of Destiny, or just some local gossip?
answers: I seek the Sword of Destiny!
Tell me about the local gossip.

name: elder_quest_offer
monologue: The Sword of Destiny is a powerful artifact, but it is guarded by a fearsome beast. I can give you this Health Potion to help you on your way.

reward.name: Health Potion
reward.description: A simple potion that restores a small amount of health.

name: elder_gossip
monologue: They say the baker is using sawdust in his bread again. Shocking, I know. Now, is there anything else I can help you with?
